comment: He is very knowledgeable of the material in class but he takes the class very seriously. The syllabus and the rubric were very vague. Overall the material is easy but be prepared for a lot of weekly assignments and a very challenging grade criteria.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--So many papers

comment: This is the one professor I have had a problem with in the school of music. While the class is incredibly easy, he acts so entitled and talks down to students who don't play trumpet.

Although the work in his class isn't particularly hard , he takes his class way too serious, he 's also condescending. This class is no "easy A" he makes you work for it. By far the worse professor I've had especially for a general ed course.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--Tough grader

comment: Best guy ever! Taught me almost everything I know about playing trumpet. If you are a music major with trumpet as your main instrument I would highly consider coming to KSU to study with him.
Awesome guy! If you practice, and know your stuff, you'll do fine.
